description: Proposed works: The erection of a rear single-storey side infill extension.
decision_conditions:
All new materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works to be carried out in this connection) shall match the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution, and finished appearance.


REASON: In the interests of the visual amenities of the surrounding area.

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-7aa15117-7fff-6602-3e5c-45d462425098"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(31, 31, 31); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification, a drainage layout and a management &amp; maintenance plan (where applicable) of the water butt with overflow shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-7aa15117-7fff-6602-3e5c-45d462425098"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(31, 31, 31); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To mitigate the effects of surface water flooding. </span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-7aa15117-7fff-6602-3e5c-45d462425098"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
